title: 98/410/CFSP: Council Decision of 29 June 1998 extending the application of Joint Action 97/875/CFSP in support of the democratic transition process in the Democratic Republic of Congo
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 June 1998 extending the application of Joint Action 97/875/CFSP in support of the democratic transition process in the Democratic Republic of Congo (98/410/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Joint Action 97/875/CFSP shall be extended until 30 June 1999.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 357, 31. 12. 1997, p. 1.
